channel.title: Error while running NetBeans
channel.description: Well this isnt a error from my code its a problem with netbeans, It shows a error message in the bottom left and says something about a null pointer and to report it to the manufacturers so i totally uninstalled it and re-installed it and it did it again, it runs really slow, its the ONLY slow thing on my comp. If you open a window then close it netbeans turns grey and then you have to move your mouse over stuff for it to be visible again.. Anyone had this happen?

item.title: Error while running NetBeans
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Well this isnt a error from my code its a problem with netbeans, It shows a error message in the bottom left and says something about a null pointer and to report it to the manufacturers so i totally uninstalled it and re-installed it and it did it again, it runs really slow, its the ONLY slow thing on my comp. If you open a window then close it netbeans turns grey and then you have to move your mouse over stuff for it to be visible againâ€¦ Anyone had this happen?
